Package com.trading.application.portfolio.repository

Class PortfolioRepository

java.lang.Object
com.trading.application.portfolio.repository.PortfolioRepository
@Repository public class PortfolioRepository extends Object
The Repository class for interacting with the Firestore database to manage portfolios.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Portfolio objects representing the public portfolios.

      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during execution.
      InterruptedException - If the operation is interrupted.
